comments.text:
Translated:  1st Part:  Everyone wank off before the mission? Yeah. 

2nd part: Check out my Yo-Yo skills! Your Yo-Yo skills have nothing on my 
knitting!  Oh yeah well in a few seconds we made a baby sh- aw shit they 
made a whole outfit. 

Part 3: Wanna see a card trick?  Now to shuffle the car- damn it I dropped 
them! Quick, grab a card! That's not your card? Aha! Check your pocket, 
this was all a ruse! I hid it in there whie you were baffled by my 
stupidity!  Hey, what's that hanging from the side of your head?  A golden 
egg! How'd I do that?  Now watch as I accelerate the birthing process and 
transform this egg into a bird!

Part 4: This is getting ridiculous, let's just g- Hey I can juggle.  I can 
make balloon animals.  I'm great at the ball & cup. I make lego 
spaceships!  I sometimes argue with my sock! I can create flowers from 
sound waves! You will be entranced by the floating object.  
Entraaaaaanced.  I can defy gravity with my new Yo-yo!  I can solve a Rubix 
cube in under 5 hours! My breathe is actually made of fire! I know so many 
Yo-Yo tri- *Silenced Bang* Enough!  We go in on 3.  1....2....3!  Pick a 
card!  Look at my spaceship! Stop yelling at me Mrs. Sock!  I got a ball & 
cup! Look at all my yo-yo tri- *Shots fired*﻿
